title: Introduction to Science
description: Learn the basics of science including physics, chemistry, and biology fundamentals.

lessons.title: What is Science?
lessons.content:
What is Science?

Science is a systematic way of learning about the natural world through observation and experimentation.

Key Points:

  • Observation: Carefully watching and recording what happens
  • Hypothesis: Making an educated guess about why something happens
  • Experiment: Testing your hypothesis
  • Conclusion: Analyzing results and drawing conclusions

Science helps us understand everything from tiny atoms to vast galaxies!

lessons.title: The Scientific Method
lessons.content:
The Scientific Method

The scientific method is a step-by-step process scientists use to answer questions:

  1. Ask a Question - What do you want to know?
  2. Do Background Research - What do others know?
  3. Construct a Hypothesis - What do you think will happen?
  4. Test with an Experiment - Does it work?
  5. Analyze Data - What did you find?
  6. Draw Conclusions - Was your hypothesis correct?
  7. Communicate Results - Share what you learned!

title: Healthy Living Basics
description: Essential health and hygiene practices for students and families.

lessons.title: Personal Hygiene
lessons.content:
Personal Hygiene / ذاتی صفائی

Good hygiene keeps you healthy and prevents diseases.

Daily Hygiene Habits:

  • 🧼 Wash hands with soap for 20 seconds
  • 🪥 Brush teeth twice daily
  • 🚿 Bathe regularly to stay clean
  • 👕 Wear clean clothes every day
  • 💅 Keep nails trimmed and clean

ہاتھ دھونا بیماریوں سے بچنے کا سب سے آسان طریقہ ہے!

lessons.title: Healthy Eating
lessons.content:
Healthy Eating / صحت بخش خوراک

A balanced diet gives your body the nutrients it needs.

Food Groups:

  • 🍎 Fruits & Vegetables: Vitamins and minerals
  • 🍞 Grains: Energy from carbohydrates
  • 🥛 Dairy: Calcium for strong bones
  • 🍗 Protein: Meat, eggs, beans for muscle
  • 💧 Water: 8 glasses daily!

Tip: Eat more fruits and vegetables, less sugar and fried foods.
